name: Red Pepe
public_notice: The contract creator has the ability to make changes to the smart contract governing the asset, such as disabling selling, altering fees, creating new tokens, or transferring existing ones. Please proceed with caution and DYOR before making any decisions.
additional_notices: No active trades are found for this coin. Please submit a ticket at %{link} if you think this is an error.

description.en:
Red Pepe is a memecoin project with a mission to become the next big Pepe memecoin. Our goal is to create a fun and engaging platform for the crypto community, where users can participate in farming/staking, collect unique NFTs, and influence the future of the project through governance tokens. By conquering one Pepe at a time, we aim to create a community-driven project that offers real value to its users.
Red Pepe, RedPepe - Is Next gen memetic Red power, With No tax and Transaction Limit , Because Our Team Wants You Aimed At The Moon As Well.
